channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Smashed back window, 24th July
item.description:
Dangerous to children

Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Misleading sign, 24th July
item.description:
Today there was a hit in the rear accident. An elderly woman slammed on her brakes and was hit from behind by a van. The lady said she thought she saw a no entry sign and therefore stopped. The sign is the rear of a normal road sign with a white sign stuck on it. Luckily nobody was hurt . The sign is misleading presented as it is.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): St George's Drive, Pimlico, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian crossing sensor pointed at cycle box, 24th July
item.description:
Facing from Victoria Park Road towards Mare Street, on the road going left (southbound Mare Street), the pedestrian crossing is causing a delay to traffic On the right hand side light of the crossing, the pedestrian sensor is pointed toward the waiting traffic rather than at the pedestrians
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Park Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - pole leaning / equipment detached from pole/facing the wrong direction

item.title: Car parked on double yellow lines on a busy corner, 24th July
item.description:
This car has been parked for over 1 week already, and half of the car is parked across the double yellow lines. This is a busy road corner, and large lorries which deliver to businesses on Sydenham Road are turning here daily. This car should not be parked across the double yellow lines.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Earlsthorpe Road, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The water is leaking into the pavement light cover, which should be covered and into the basement of the property., 24th July
item.description:
The rain and leaves are going through this broken pavement lights cover and needs covering. As it’s leaking through to the bottom of the basement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Alexandra Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped bike and office chair, 24th July
item.description:

item.title: Garden waste dumped on footpath, 24th July
item.description:
There is garden waste dumped on the footpath. It's a clearly from the house it's out front of. This is not the first time they have done it. Very frustrating that some of pay to have things like this removed but these people dump it

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Forburg Road, Hackney, London

item.description:

item.title: Fly tipped articles, 24th July
item.description:

item.title: Sheets of cardboard blocking pavement, 24th July
item.description:
There are sheets of heavy duty cardboard blocking the pavement at the bottom of Maximfeldt Road. This cardboard was originally dumped in the alley a few days ago but yesterday the alley was cleared and the cardboard is now dumped on the pavement
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Maximfeldt Road, Northumberland Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet
